dataManagement.title: Import Data
dataManagement.description: Import your financial data from various sources

textSource.title: Import from any Text Source
textSource.description: Parse and import transactions from bank statements, emails, or any text source. Uses AI to automatically extract transaction data.
textSource.button: Import from Text (PDF, CSV, TXT, etc)

csv.title: Import CSV
csv.description: Import transactions from a CSV file. You can map columns, handle duplicates, and create new accounts or categories as needed.
